name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

name: Bojuka Bog
oracle_text:
Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bojuka Bog enters the battlefield, exile target player's graveyard.
{T}: Add {B}.

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

name: Consider
oracle_text:
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Ivold gasped in surprise. Either a very strange insect had crawled onto one of the lenses or he was seeing geists at last!

name: Curate
oracle_text:
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Aha! This must be one of the ancient keys to... No, wait. It's just another puzzle toy."

name: Deep Analysis
oracle_text:
Target player draws two cards.
Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Ephara's Dispersal
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets an attacking creature.
Return target creature to its owner's hand. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

name: Gideon's Sacrifice
oracle_text: Choose a creature or planeswalker you control. All damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to the chosen permanent instead (if it's still on the battlefield).
flavor_text: To Liliana's surprise, the cost of betraying Bolas did not fall on her.

name: Notion Rain

name: Otherworldly Gaze

oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
